Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update all calculators to 2026 with centralized tax rate system

Created centralized tax rate configuration system and updated all 12 calculators to use verified 2026 Norwegian tax rates from Skatteetaten.

New Files:
- tax-rates-config.js: Centralized rate configuration with both 2025 and 2026 rates
- CLAUDE.md: Comprehensive project documentation and maintenance guide

Calculator Updates \(2025 â†’ 2026\):
- skatt.html: Trinnskatt brackets updated, Trygdeavgift 7.6% \(down from 8.3%\), Minstefradrag max 95,700 kr
- brutto-netto.html: Dynamic tax calculation using actual 2026 rates
- feriepenger.html: Centralized holiday pay rates \(10.2% / 12%\)
- overtid.html: Centralized overtime multipliers \(1.5x / 2.0x\)
- arbeidsgiveravgift.html: Added NEW Zone 4a at 7.9% for Nord-Norge
- stromkostnad.html: Centralized VAT rate \(25%\)
- barnebidrag.html: Centralized child support rate \(1,710 kr/month\)
- sykepenger.html: Updated 6G cap to 780,960 kr \(from 744,168 kr\)
- pendlerfradrag.html: Updated to 1.90 kr/km with 12,000 kr egenandel and 120,000 kr max
- tilhengervekt.html: Year reference updated to 2026
- bilkostnad.html: Year reference updated to 2026
- index.html: All year references updated to 2026

Key 2026 Tax Changes:
- Trinnskatt: All brackets adjusted with new thresholds and slightly lower rates
- Trygdeavgift: LÃ¸nnsinntekt reduced to 7.6%, new categories for nÃ¦ring \(10.8%\), pensjon \(5.1%\)
- GrunnbelÃ¸pet \(G\): Increased to 130,160 kr \(+4.9%\)
- Arbeidsgiveravgift: New zone 4a added
- Pendlerfradrag: Rate increased to 1.90 kr/km with new deductible and cap
- Minstefradrag: Maximum decreased to 95,700 kr

Benefits:
- Single source of truth for all tax rates
- Easy annual updates \(one file instead of 12+\)
- Historical rate data preserved
- Consistent rates across all calculators
